snippet: Martin St. Louis is a top scorer in his late 30s, well past what a new study says are the top years of almost all hockey players.
abstract: Slap Shot column; New York Rangers forward Martin St Louis is a top scorer in his late 30s, well past what a new study says are the top years of almost all hockey players; study will appear in Journal of Quantitative Analysis in Sports; other NHL items noted.
lead_paragraph: Martin St. Louis is a top scorer in his late 30s, well past what a new study says are the top years of almost all hockey players.

headline.main: A Rangers Forward Amazes an Economist
headline.print_headline: A Rangers Forward Amazes an Economist
